title: Fortinet security advisory (AV25-821)
description: On December 9, 2025, Fortinet published security advisories to address vulnerabilities in multiple products including one critical vulnerability.
products:
FortiCloud SSO Login Authentication Bypass affecting the following products: FortiOS, FortiWeb, FortiProxy and FortiSwitchManager.
	(CVE-2025-59718, CVE-2025-59719)
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
